American Construction! operates with what some would call old-fashioned values. When you hire American Construction you can expect our team members to be clean cut & friendly. Our Philosophy is simple... Treat others how you would like to be treated.We operate in the Scottsdale, Cave Creek, Rio Verde and Paradise Valley Locations.Mostly Serving the following communities: +Desert Mountain+Troon North+Arcadia+Biltmore+Desert Ridge+Rio VerdeCreated and Implemented highly recommended Construction business in the Scottsdale, Rio Verde, Cave Creek and Paradise Valley Area. Working on my first book to publish by Christmas 2017. "Idea 2 Business" will be about how to build a successful business from start to running successfully. I wanted to create a book that is made for the small business. I know there are many books about how to make millions or how to books that are not very specific in step by step procedures. After creating a couple successful businesses I would like to help others do the same. My book will mainly focus on starting small-medium sized companies in the services industry. However my steps will flow into any business, this book will focus on what I know and from my experiences in the service industry and sales.

This major will provide you with knowledge, skills, and resources to start, manage, and grow a small business. Specifically, this program will help turn an initial business idea into a reality through a series of 'must-do' actions and learning activities. This program includes placement in an internship, where you will gain real-world experience in small business management. As a capstone project, you will synthesize all of the program's learning experiences by completing a thorough and well-written business plan for a business idea.

Team Rubicon seeks to provide our veterans with three things they lose after leaving the military: a purpose, gained through disaster relief; community, built by serving with others; and self-worth, from recognizing the impact one individual can make. Coupled with leadership development and other opportunities, TR also aims to "bridge the gap" between military and civilian life. I love being apart of the team and it really allows to to still have that sense of worth.

summary: Austin Richardson is a skilled businessman with multiple years of experience in running, developing and creating businesses. Married to Famous Race Horse Jockey Cassie Papineau, and have a 5 year old son named Colt and 2 year old daughter named Callie.A self-made leader and experienced professional with more than 16 years of experience emphasizing sales, marketing and business development in Technology Implementation, Team building, Building Construction, Residential Remodeling, Application Development, Website Development and Customer Service Oriented Business. Skilled and knowledgeable with software analysis, distribution, manufacturing and DeliveryHighly customer-centric with excellent relationship building skills as evidenced by achievement in building over 5 profitable and expanding companies, primarily through referrals and client relations. Directs all aspects of the process of improvement life cycle including: proposals, contracting, business process analysis, project planning, resourcing, training, delivery, close-out, and continuous improvement. Strong sales and marketings skills to build new business and cultivate existing customer relationships. Self-confident, organized and highly motivated. Bring creativity and an entrepreneurial spirit to all business endeavors.Specialized in root cause analysis with relationship skills to inspire teams to outperform expectations, bridge project goals and technology solutions in alignment with company strategy. Experienced interfacing with senior management, business personnel, technical groups, operations, clients and vendors. A proven leader and consistently recognized for delivering projects on time and under budget while providing exceptional profitable business outcomes. Thrive on opportunities to collaborate with clients, personnel and senior executives. Drive innovation and identify and translate customer needs into concrete, marketable initiatives in the logistics processes. .
